title: 999 wins I'd like someone from riot to play with me :)
body: Hey I just reached 999 wins and I'd much appreciate it if someone from riot could help me get my 1000th win :)

replies.body:
Hey LMC, 

Add me in game - i'll play :)
ive passed 1000 wins but i havent asked for a game with a rioteer, can i add you?
... and then you woke up and realised "hey riot iz tu buzey ta du dis".
... and then you woke up and realised "hey riot actually does dis".
yeah they do, but what are your chances compared to other people

ive played about 40 games with rioters, some ranked. 

problem?

I just want somebody decent to play with, every fkn game if i don't carry we lose.

When do I get to be carried?

and what happens after u paly with them? they r gone for good and you never speak to dem again? i don't see the point. 
it would be funny to see someone rage in the game, and how the rito moderator reacts.
